Message:
After living deep in
the forest for many years,
Gran suddenly became sick.

No medicine seemed to work,
and we grew more
scared by the day.

What saved us were
two traveling witches.

A witch with long,
flowing blonde hair—
Miss Aura—handed me a ring
inset with a blue gemstone.

“Tell me. What is it
that you wish for?”

Coaxed by her gentle voice,
I told her my wish.

As the words left my lips,
the blue ring began
to glow bright gold.

It then became a ball of light
covering Gran.

When the light faded,
Gran’s pained breaths
began to ease...

“...It worked...!
Gran, everything
will be all right now!
We can still be together
for a long time...yet...”

Suddenly, I lost all of my strength,
and felt on the verge of fainting.

My consciousness faded
as soon as the other witch
with Aura caught my fall.

When I came to,
the witches had long gone...

Mmm... I...missed my chance
to thank them...
